timeline.bodyText: The Gemfile.lock used for this test is huge. Assert on everything in that file or remove it.

replies.bodyText: I thought the goal was just to assert on every "unique" type of relationship/stipulation in the file, no, @taikuukaits ?

replies.bodyText: Yes. Do that, and delete every non unique entry.
